title: Two Royal Bengal Cubs Born In Assam Zoo. See Pics - NDTV
content: Two Royal Bengal Cubs Born In Assam Zoo. See Pics  NDTVView Full coverage on Google News
description: Principal Chief Conservator of Forest (Wildlife), Amit Sahai, said the mother is being taken care of with a nutritious diet. "Around 6-7 kg of meat is being provided to the mother along with other veterinary prescribed food," he added.
